pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, May 6, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Emir of Qatar, His Highness Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani.

Trenton, Ontario

2:30 p.m.  The Prime Minister will attend the repatriation ceremony for the six Canadian Armed Forces members killed in a helicopter crash during Operation REASSURANCE.

8 Wing/CFB Trenton

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • Interested media are asked to contact the 8 Wing/CFB Trenton Public Affairs Officer, Major Trevor Reid, at trevor.reid2@forces.gc.ca or 613-403-7177.

Ottawa, Ontario

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

Closed to media.
